service-details.pageTitle: รายละเอียดบริการ — สถาปัตยกรรมซอฟต์แวร์และการปรับปรุงระบบ | Vionix Consulting
service-details.metaDescription: Vionix Consulting ให้บริการด้านประสิทธิภาพฐานข้อมูลและรายงาน การทำระบบเดิมให้เสถียร การปรับปรุงระบบแบบค่อยเป็นค่อยไป และการยกระดับทีมสำหรับระบบซอฟต์แวร์สำคัญ

case-study-vionix-01.pageTitle: Case Study: When 4-Hour Reports Block Your Entire HQ: Rebuilding Trust Through Database Discipline | Vionix Consulting
case-study-vionix-01.metaDescription: How Vionix cut 4-hour distribution reports to minutes via indexing, SQL views, and safer reporting—restoring HQ stability in three weeks.

case-study-vionix-02.pageTitle: Case Study: When the Whole Business Runs Through a Cash Desk: Solving Chronic POS Failures in 80+ Fashion Stores | Vionix Consulting
case-study-vionix-02.metaDescription: How Vionix reduced chronic POS failures across 80+ stores by redesigning dust-hardened hardware and introducing ventilation and cleaning cycles.

case-study-vionix-03.pageTitle: Case Study: Restoring Trust in Critical Compliance: Zero-Failure Inventory Rollout for Compliance Audits | Vionix Consulting
case-study-vionix-03.metaDescription: How Vionix delivered an offline-first inventory system with audit-ready paper trails and a zero-failure rollout across 80 stores.

case-study-vionix-04.pageTitle: Case Study: Making Inventory Visible: How a Monitoring Layer Stabilised 80-Store Data Collection | Vionix Consulting
case-study-vionix-04.metaDescription: How Vionix added monitoring, dashboards, and fallback retrieval paths to make overnight store data reliable across 80+ locations.

case-study-vionix-05.pageTitle: Case Study: From Research Scripts to Agency-Ready Software: Industrialising a Forest Inventory Method | Vionix Consulting
case-study-vionix-05.metaDescription: How Vionix turned research scripts into a deployable Windows desktop app with usable workflows and handover-ready code for agency demos.

case-study-vionix-06.pageTitle: Case Study: From Spaghetti to Strategy: Rebuilding a Spectrum Analyzer Software Stack | Vionix Consulting
case-study-vionix-06.metaDescription: How Vionix rebuilt unstable spectrum-analyzer software into a maintainable, cross-platform Qt/C++ stack and enabled sustainable internal development.

case-study-vionix-07.pageTitle: Case Study: When the Webshop Was Ready—But the Back-End Wasn't | Vionix Consulting
case-study-vionix-07.metaDescription: How Vionix designed a DMZ integration layer and REST API to connect a ready webshop to a live rental ERP and launch on schedule.

case-study-vionix-08.pageTitle: Case Study: When Offline Isn't Optional: Rebuilding a Field Service System That Actually Works in Construction Pits | Vionix Consulting
case-study-vionix-08.metaDescription: How Vionix replaced a failing field-service system with a typed C# stack and reliable offline synchronization for technicians in harsh conditions.

case-study-vionix-09.pageTitle: Case Study: From Chaos to Control: Stabilising a 30-Year Legacy ERP Without Rewriting It | Vionix Consulting
case-study-vionix-09.metaDescription: How Vionix stabilised a 30-year ERP by introducing version control, isolated dev environments, and incremental modernization without a rewrite.

case-study-vionix-10.pageTitle: Case Study: When Real-Time Became Possible Again | Vionix Consulting
case-study-vionix-10.metaDescription: How Vionix replaced a failing nightly BI ETL pipeline with indexed SQL Views and restored real-time reporting performance at scale.

case-study-vionix-11.pageTitle: Case Study: Bridging the Gap: Digitalising Goods Receipt on Legacy Hardware | Vionix Consulting
case-study-vionix-11.metaDescription: How Vionix delivered a Windows CE goods-receipt app and SOAP middleware to eliminate paper workflows and run for years without software incidents.

case-study-vionix-12.pageTitle: Case Study: Turning a Black-Box Legacy System into a Company-Wide Delivery and Support Operating System | Vionix Consulting
case-study-vionix-12.metaDescription: How Vionix migrated a legacy project and service operating model to Jira Cloud with a pilot, rollout, and full handover to the client team.
